archimate:Requirement.name: PE-16: Delivery and Removal
archimate:Requirement.documentation: a. Authorize and control [Assignment: organization-defined types of system components] entering and exiting the facility; and b. Maintain records of the system components.

properties.value: Enforcing authorizations for entry and exit of system components may require restricting access to delivery areas and isolating the areas from the system and media libraries.
